Title: Romulus & Remus: The First King
Writer: Filippo Gravino (story), Francesca Manieri (story), Matteo Rovere (story), Filippo Gravino (screenplay), Francesca Manieri (screenplay), Matteo Rovere (screenplay)
Actors: Alessandro Borghi, Alessio Lapice, Fabrizio Rongione, Massimiliano Rossi
Plot: Romulus and Remus, two shepherds and loyal brothers, end up taking part to a journey that will lead one of them to be the founder of the greatest nation ever seen. However, the fate of the chosen one will pass from killing his own brother.
